attributes.review: What kind of president makes an app for himself. This is such a horrible app it took 24 hours to completely download. I also cannot express how bad this president is. I’m ashamed to be an American because of him.
attributes.title: This is the worst app ever invented

attributes.review: first of all this app took at least 7 hours to download 🙄 and when i was finally able to open the app it took another hour for the loading screen to go away. THIS APP IS TERRIBLE DONT DOWNLOAD IT
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: This app took three hours to download and every time I tried to open the app my phone would crash. Do not download it is terrible. All the links are fake. Email isn’t real. 🧚‍♀️ 🧚‍♂️ ❇️
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: Awful awful awful I cannot believe that our president made this this is the worst app ever used it is so glitchy nothing works. Do not get this under any circumstances
attributes.title: This is our president??

attributes.review: This app is really glitchy and kept closing every three seconds it messed up my phone a little to after I got it my WiFi was really bad
attributes.title: Don’t recommend

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. And if that wasn’t bad enough, it made my phone glitch so bad. Whenever I opened the app, the screen turned bright orange and I couldn’t use the app at all. I think this app gave my phone a virus. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS THE WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I was very excited to download the app to support my racist president but it just doesn’t work. I thought that my leader that looks like a Cheeto could of made a decent app but sadly he just continues to disappoint me.
attributes.title: You hate to see it 😔

attributes.review: It took over 6 days to download. It wouldn’t let me press a single button and screen was glitched. Happened to all my friends to. Horrible content.
attributes.title: Horrible content

attributes.review: This is so yucky 🙄🙄 the worst app ever!!! i almost passed away because of the danger to my life this poses. i saw a review say i’m a child, but i’m actually 23 and can legally vote. and i educate myself very well! but ugh what a life threatening app it’s so sad 😢
attributes.title: blahblajnlahnsnsbsbbddjshxh

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone got hacked! Someone tried stealing money from my back account they also changed all my passwords to my social media and made Donald trump post on my social media’s. Not cool and not a safe app! DO NOT DOWNLOAD This app!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Hacked!
